title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.93 - Termination and suspension
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.93 - Termination and suspension

State Regulations

The commissioner shall terminate this Part at the end of
any month whenever he finds, after a public hearing, that the conditions which
he found as the basis for the issuance of this order have ceased to exist or
that such termination is favored by at least 35 percent of the producers as
herein defined. This Part shall, in any event, terminate whenever the
provisions of the statute authorizing it cease to be in
effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
21.93

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
